text: Ara bedu'inadera madhyera ke'u-ke'u allahâ€Œte o sesadine imana ane, ara ya se kharaca kare ta allahâ€Œra naikatya o rasulera asirbada anabe bale ganya kare. Bastabika'i e nihsandeha tadera jan'ya naikatyalabha. Allah acire'i tadera prabesa karabena tamra karunasindhute. Nihsandeha allah paritranakari, aphuranta phaladata.
